title: Winters Frost V2 TEAM RECRUITMENT
body:
If you are looking to join a serious ranked 5's team this is the place to be!!  

**_TEAM INFORMATION_**

* This is a team that is looking to rebuild OG Name Winters Frost
* We are looking for Subs for all roles and possible starters for all roles
* Team Practices/ Games will be held every Tuesday/ Thursday at 6PM PST- 9PM PST; Also may be held on Mondays or Wednesdays if all players are available!! Fridays are days off, Saturday and Sundays will be for Tournaments or scrims!
* Voice Comm is a must! Choice between CV and TS, we mainly use CV atm but do have a TS server
* We will also have a chat room on the KIK App on your phone so please download that! (May be switched to a different app if anyone has something else, if you make the team I will add you to the group!)
* The OG team was Bronze 1 with decent ELO players Silver 2 was the lowest hightest was Plat 1
* Looking to rebuild/ restart since we had problems with Team Members not showing up/ leaving the team on the own accord
* As well as we are looking for players we are also looking for a Game Analyzer! Too qualify for this you must have Experience at it/ High ELO player who understands the game!

**_TEAM APPLICATION_**

* Player APP-
Time Zone:
Current Rank:
Main Role:
Sub Role:
Main Champs:
Team Experience:
Play-Style:
IGN:

* Game Analyzer APP-
Time Zone:
Current Rank:
Team Experience:
Analyzer Experience:
IGN:

Play-Style: Controlling of both objectives and the map through heavy warding. I am likely to outward the support most games and as far as aggression or farming that depends on the champ.
